title: Exquisite Teardrop Ruby and Diamond Danglers - Karna Kundalalu
features: A modern take on the classic Jhumka design. Features a rich, teardrop-shaped ruby as the focal point, surrounded by a halo of shimmering rose-cut diamonds in a prong setting. The ear-stud component features three graduating rose cut diamonds bezel set, providing a delicate yet secure hold. Finished with our signature Hyderabadi polish for exceptional luster and shine. The ruby has a smooth, cabochon-like polished surface with a faceted effect on the edges catching the light beautifully.
occasions: or adding a touch of sophistication to a modern Indian outfit. Also suitable for special occasions like weddings
and festive celebrations like Diwali and Sankranthi.
description: A unique blend of traditional Indian aesthetics and contemporary design. The rich ruby symbolizes love and passion, while the diamonds add a touch of timeless elegance. Expertly crafted by our skilled artisans in Hyderabad, showcasing the region's renowned jewelry-making heritage. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and enhances the beauty of the materials. Rose cut diamonds give this piece a vintage feel with modern allure.
